item.description:
Every Friday come join us for Friday Night Magic at The Temple Games! The Temple is an adult-gamer friendly gaming store and lounge located in Pawtucket, RI designed for comfort, class, competition, and a ridiculous amount of fun.

FNM is either Standard Constructed or Booster Draft. Check out our Friday Night Magic Event Listing to view what format is currently running at The Temple!

Time: 7:00 PM
Place: The Temple Games. 167 Columbus Avenue Pawtucket RI
Entry Fee: Just $13 for Booster Drafts/$5 for Standard Constructed
Prize Support: 1.5 packs per player in the prize pool, distributed down from top 3 through 8 depending on turnout. In addition, FNM Cards, promos, and additional prizes will be given away as both top placing prizes and door prizes!

Anyone that's played here can attest to the great crowd and solid prize support. We also go late, so check out our popular late night booster drafts after FNM on Friday!

We'll see you on here! For more info, hit www.thetemplegames.com!
item.name: [Pawtucket RI] Friday Night Magic at The Temple Games
